item.title: Supercharging Social Capital
item.description: :::: entry-content I’ve been working with some fantastic colleagues (Duncan Work and Duncan Holmes) on ways to harness social capital{.zem_slink rel=“wikipedia”} (the relationship kind vs. financial kind). For me, the interest is applying it to ventures that are working toward a just and sustainable society – but, more generally, I believe it is our most underutilized form or capital and is becoming increasingly important in the current economic downturn and the new mode of organization that I see emerging.
